casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

August 27, 2008

[Cite as 08/27/2008 Case Announcements #2, 2008-0hio-4360.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2008-1225. State v. Rife-Anello.

Stark App. No. 2006CA00340, 2007-Ohio-4822. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from a court of appeals’ decision pursuant to App.R. 26(B). Upon consideration of appellant’s emergency motion for stay,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
